text: -Hey. Glad you're here.

My mom got in touch
with Caroline Baker last night,

and they're gonna
get together next month.
-That's nice.

-Erica, as much
as I appreciate your offer...
I can't stay.
And I want you to know why.

-Kevin, you don't have to --
-No, no.
Listen, I, uh...

I always wanted to work
with my father.

You know, the plan was
to retire from the FBI

and join his little
detective agency.

Turns out, I didn't make it
to retirement.
I got kicked out.
And my dad was there for me.

So that agency is
all I have left of him.
And I just...
I just can't let it go.
-You really are a sweet man.
Kevin...

You getting kicked out
of the FBI...

Did that have anything
to do with Ted?

I mean, you said the two of you
didn't speak all those years.

-That's a story
for another time.
